item.name: Authentication

User registration

This endpoint allows a user to register by providing their name, email, and password.

response.name: validation failed

item.name:
User login

This endpoint allows a user to log in by providing their email and password.

response.name: validation failed

item.name:
User logout

This endpoint allows a user to log out by deleting their current authentication token.
Comment Management

Create a new comment

This endpoint allows a user to create a comment on a post.

response.name: validation failed

item.name:
Show a specific comment

This endpoint retrieves the details of a specific comment.

Update a specific comment

This endpoint allows a user to update a specific comment.

Delete a specific comment

This endpoint allows a user to delete a specific comment.
Connection Management

Get all connections for a user

This endpoint retrieves all connections (friend requests) for a specific user.

Create a new connection

This endpoint creates a new connection (friend request) between two users.

response.name: validation failed

item.name:
Show a specific connection

This endpoint retrieves the details of a specific connection.

Update the status of a connection

This endpoint updates the status of a specific connection (e.g., accepting the friend request).

Delete a specific connection

This endpoint deletes a specific connection (friendship).
Like Management

Add a like

This endpoint adds a like to a specific post by a specific user.

response.name: validation failed

item.name:
Show a like

This endpoint retrieves details of a specific like.

Delete a like

This endpoint deletes a specific like.
Post Management

Get all posts

This endpoint retrieves all posts along with their related users, likes, and comments.

Show a specific post

This endpoint retrieves the details of a specific post along with its related data.

Delete a specific post

This endpoint deletes a specific post.
Profile Management

Get all profiles

This endpoint retrieves a list of all user profiles.

Show a specific profile

This endpoint retrieves details of a specific user profile.

Delete a specific profile

This endpoint deletes a specific user profile.
